::: Set, at the control panel glances at the activity behinde him with Shuko 
ordering around the underlings. :::

::: When he turns, he see's Hell Beast and Jackle emerge from the palm tree 
forests. ::: Ah...more targets!

::: When he placed his finger on the targeting button, a burst of static 
roared over the bridge and Hell BEast spoke. :::

::: HELL BEAST ::: This is Senator hell Beast of the Predacon Council. I 
demand to know what business you have coming here!

::: Set's mouth dropped. The rumors were true...the Senator was alive and on 
this planet! :::

::: Set ::: Senator...Its nice to see you...alive and well. Were currently 
experiencing some resistance from your opponets. Help would be appriciated.

::: HELL BEAST ::: Who the hel lis this?!

::: Set ::: This is President Set of Predcorp Integalactic. We would invite 
you in...but there is a mess.

::: Hell Beast ::: Argh! Open up the hatch now.

::: Set looked to Shuko. ::: Um, Senator Hell Beast is here! And he wants to 
come aboard. I would kill him...but he dose have the maps and information we 
need...
